resources.string: Each day is a new opportunity to gain. Hopefully knowledge and not weight.
Every challenge in my life is an opportunity to eat.
I have so much to do still.
Good things are always knocking first.
New challenges await me at every turn.
I have the courage to follow my dragon heart.
Things will unfold at precisely the time you make them happen.
I will be a present in all the moments of this day.
